summary: Adds 3 Dwemer Dogs Companions (with sounds and voices) in the Salvius Farm + 5 summonable followers Dwemer Dogs (Farengar)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Dwemer Dogs Companions [/b][/size][/color] [color=#00ff00]version 1.3.1[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional file: Esp version Fr.[/color]


Adds 3 Dwemer Dogs Companions[color=#00ff00]*[/color] (with [i]sounds[/i] and [i]voices[/i]) in the [color=#00ff00]Salvius Farm [/color](near Markath) + 5 summonable followers Dwemer Dogs (Farengar)

[color=#00ff00]*[/color][i]These dogs were found in Dwemer ruins, then brought back in this farm by their owners !

Ces chiens ont été trouvés dans des ruines Dwemer, puis ramenés dans cette ferme par leurs propriétaires ![/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ECN4Zpc.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]Male[/size][/b][/color] Sounds: [i]Dwarven Centurion [/i]- Voice: [i]Male Dark Elf[/i]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]Female[/size][/b][/color] Sounds: [i]Dwarven Spider [/i]- Voice: [i]Female Dark Elf[/i]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]Pup[/size][/b][/color] Sounds: [i]Dwarven Sphere [/i]


You can talk: Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss, with these dogs

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=851156DwemerDogs4.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/851156DwemerDogs4.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]CREDITS[/size][/b][/color]

[color=#ff8c00]Verkister aka me [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58214/?] Dwemer Dog Follower [/url]for the mesh of the Dwemer Dog ("You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me ")

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=629896Male.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/629896Male.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]SUMMONABLE FOLLOWERS[/size][/b][/color] (No Voices, just Sounds)

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=918128Dwemerdog.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/918128Dwemerdog.jpg[/img][/url]

You must place the .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 6 books...

You can find the “Spell tome: XXX Dwemer Dog” at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome: Dismiss Dwemer Dogs"

If you have any problem with the mount, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...


[color=#ff0000]Video[/color] with the version 1.3.1 ([color=#00ff00]Mod 5 at 23'30''[/color])

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]HfRpl3G0_rU[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[img]https://i.imgur.com/cctqoBn.gif[/img]

(Gif by Verkister aka me/ Vomitrocious)
author: gg77
